content: materials - 1 1 1 2 2 3 skein s of purl soho s plenty 1 100% extra fine merino each skein is 139 yards/ 100 grams approximately 80 100 135 165 215 260 total yards required we used mint blue reed gray and fresh fig - us 8 5 mm 12-inch for baby size or 16-inch circular knitting needles 2 - us 7 4 5 mm 12-inch for baby size or 16-inch circular needles - a set of us 7 double pointed needles 3 - removable stitch markers 4 including one unique note prefer to make your hat using magic loop 5 just swap the 12- or 16-inch circular needles and double pointed needles above for 32-inch or longer needles of the same size note an earlier version of this pattern was knit using 1 2 skeins of purl soho s alpaca pure 6 no longer available in the colors heirloom white artemisia storm gray for the baby kid adult medium hats click here 7 for more on this version gauge 17 stitches and 32 row/rounds = 4 inches in garter stitch with smaller needles sizes baby toddler kid adult small adult medium adult large -
